title: SEO 2017: Complete SEO Training + SEO for WordPress Websites

visible_instructors.title: Arun Nagarathanam

description:
This course,Â SEO 2017Â Training:Â The Complete SEO CourseÂ for WordPressÂ Websites is all about 40Â SEO (Search Engine Optimization)Â factors onÂ how to reach top spot on Google search with Search Engine Optimization.

Each SEO factor is explained in the following ways:

>Â Why is that a SEO factor?

>Â Trend analysis for the SEO factor in the recent years

>Â Live example of how that SEO factor delivers results

>Â When and how to use these SEO factors?

  • Danial Ashrafi says, "For Newbies it is a thousand time better course than others"
  • Beam CoÂ says, "His content is very well presented and I would say of high value for people looking for a big picture overview to get started"
  • Aravind Automation Engineer says, "Excellent and very clear explanation on SEO core points. Commanded.."
  • Abhishek Bamotra says, "Easy to understand and best SEO guide I ever came across :)"

This entireÂ SEO 2017Â course is based on a keyword research compiledÂ from 10,000 keywords for top 30 SERPsÂ acrossÂ the year 2014,Â 2015, 2016.Â So they are all new, workingÂ and they apply 100% to 2017, 2018Â and up.

SEO is NOTÂ a Cost but an Investment. This course is specially designed for Webmasters, Bloggers, Business owners, Search Engine Optimization Beginners / Experts and Website owners, who want to rank #1 in Google.

Khairul says, "Really Excellent Course. MyÂ WordPressÂ website has been optimized. not only by SEO and improvement on the speed.Â

SEO requirement explained in detail on the importance of it and how to achieve it. Really Excellent Course.

If you are owner of aÂ WordPressÂ website, or developing for others. This will really help you. FullyÂ recommended"

This is a no fluff SEO course. Each and every lecture is prepared and polished with loads of rare information, SEO tutorial that produces results and examples or research data to justify those SEO factors.

Social Proof

  1. Bestselling SEO Course
  2. Over 11,000 Satisfied Students
  3. Over 850Â Positive Reviews
  4. Closed Captions (English Subtitles)
  5. 8.5 Hours of FullÂ HD Videos + More to Come
  6. Streamlined + Efficient Course Organisation
  7. Course Completion Certificate
  8. 30 Days money back guarantee - No questions asked
  9. Above all - Instructor withÂ 'Lightning speed'Â badge holder for his fast response time and support

CourseÂ Update Timeline

  • August 2017:Â Page Speed v3Â SEO section - 16 lectures - 1 hour 45 minutes
  • August 2017:Â Demystifying Backlinks SEO section - 8 Lectures - 27 Minutes
  • July 2017: Technical SEO v2.2, Page Speed v2.2 SEO Sections - 12 Lectures - 55 minutes
  • June 2017: Technical SEO v2.1 Section - 14 Lectures - 1 hour
  • Dec 2016:Â Page Speed SEO v2.1 Section - 7 Lectures - 40 Minutes
  • May 2016: Keyword ResearchÂ SEO section - 11 Lectures - 1 hour 15 minutes
  • April 2016: Negative SEO section - 17 Lectures - 1 hour 6 minutes

Timothy Izquierdo says, "I'm a beginner in SEO. Everything dealt till now in technical SEO factors are stuff that we do/write in daily blogging. But each of them are dealt from an advanced perspective. Still, it's so easy to learn.Â

Every concept is said, what it's? why it should be done? when it is to be done? how it should be done? based on the research graphs which is shown for each & every concept. I'm simply blown away!"

This course will help you to

  1. Master Technical SEO factors â€“ The entry ticket to search Engines
  2. Make your website load in less than a second. The interesting part of this section is, your page speed insights score will up to 100 /100 for desktop and 100 / 100 for mobile
  3. Get indexed by search engines faster
  4. Implement the best User experience for your visitors / customers â€“ The future SEO factor.Â Reduce user abandonment rate and increase userâ€™s time spent on your site
  5. LearnÂ Keyword Research in SEO -Â Get targeted traffic to your site, by using the chosen transactional / informative long tail keywords
  6. All backlinkÂ myths demystified - Learn the important attributes of backlinks and ignore the ones that don't work anymore
  7. Protect your website againstÂ Negative SEO â€“ Itâ€™s not a black hat SEO. This is your line of defense against negative SEO attacks

Learn everything from Positive SEO factors to Negative SEO factors, master them and implement on your website to get top ranking in search engines.

Though SEO is not a rocket science. Itâ€™s not that easy to grasp the impact of various terminologies used in SEO like Doorway pages, keyword stuffing, bounce rate etc.

Thatâ€™s why, for each and every SEO factor, not only youâ€™ll learn what that SEO factor is, but also youâ€™ll learn

  • Why is that a SEO factor?
  • When and how to use them?

Iâ€™ve also given justification, several examples and the proof and how to implement it on your website.Â

Negative SEOÂ is a must know section for every WordPress owner, because you may rank #1 in top pages of Google search, for your popular keywords now.Â

  1. What if, Google penalizes your website and you lose ranking for your popular keywords
  2. What if, your invisible / unknownÂ competitor attacks your websiteÂ with Negative SEOÂ

We have covered everything regarding Negative SEO attack, how to recover from it etc., in this course.

Now you should have realized, thisÂ course is not just a collection of information,Â itâ€™s highly efficient, streamlined and it will give you theÂ solid results, you have expected.

If you have ever dreamed of getting to top #1 position in Google search results, then you've come to the right course. Click on 'Take this course' greenÂ button on the top-right corner to enroll now.

Once you rank #1 in Google

  1. Your brand name will be popular
  2. You will be invited for exclusive product releases in your niche
  3. Your business / ad revenue will grow 2X to 100X based on your current position
  4. Your unique visitors per day, subscribers will increase
  5. And Much more

items: Students need to be just aware of SEO - Search Engine Optimization

Reason why those SEO factors matter in real-time
How those SEO factors affects the ranking of websites on Google
Rank 1 in Google Search with WordPress SEO 2017 Training: Do's and Dont's
SEO your website to bring in more organic traffic from Google & other search engines
Learn the Essential skills to optimize your website for Google, Bing & Yandex search engines
Make your website to load in less than 0.5 seconds & increase sales / conversions by 2X
Get page speed insights score above 95 for desktop and above 90 for mobile
Get indexed by search engines faster
Improve the User experience of your website - The future SEO factor
Decrease your website visitor's bounce rate and improve time spent on your site
Learn to use the best free SEO tools across the entire web
Get targeted traffic to your site, by using the chosen transactional / informative long tail keywords
Get low competition, high traffic optimized long tail keyword list - Hands on
Learn expired SEO techniques / Myths, which can hurt your website
Immune your website against Negative SEO attacks and identify bad backlinks to your site

faq.answer: You can view and review the lecture materials indefinitely, like an on-demand channel.
faq.question: How long do I have access to the course materials?

faq.answer: Definitely! If you have an internet connection, courses on Udemy are available on any device at any time. If you don't have an internet connection, some instructors also let their students download course lectures. That's up to the instructor though, so make sure you get on their good side!
faq.question: Can I take my courses with me wherever I go?
